Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory780.jpg'}
{3: "One week later, in Karenina's secret base."}
{3: 'Karenina saunters off the small stage as the last note on her guitar lingers.'}
{3: 'She puts away her guitar and hangs it back on the wall before wearily approaching you as you sit in front of the recording equipment.'}
{2: 'Flawless.', 3: '11', 4: "There's some problem.", 5: '13'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'How could it be flawless? That was only our first full rehearsal. Give me some more feedback.', 4: '1', 18: '100002116'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'What is it? Be more specific.', 4: '1', 18: '100002117'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "We've spent the whole week on the music arrangement and we've barely paid any attention to how the performance looks on stage.", 4: '1', 18: '100002118'}
{2: 'You may want to smile more naturally.', 3: '15', 4: 'You can be more confident in your movements.', 5: '15'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Ahem... What do you mean? Can you be more specific?', 4: '1', 18: '100002119'}
{2: 'I recorded a video. Do you want to go over it?', 3: '94'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Hold on! You were recording? I wasn't ready...", 4: '1', 18: '100002120'}
{2: "Can't miss the first time, you know.", 3: '20'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Ugh... What's the point of recording it? I've sung the song a thousand times during the arrangement.", 4: '1', 18: '100002121'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "...Forget it. Doesn't hurt to review it, I guess. Go on. Play it.", 4: '1', 18: '100002122'}
{3: 'In the video, Karenina is standing on the stage with her guitar, humming along to the music.'}
{3: "Watching herself in the recording, Karenina's focus and solemnity slowly turn into annoyance and embarrassment."}
{2: '(Pause the video)', 3: '28', 4: '(Let the video keep playing)', 5: '29'}
{3: "Noticing something off about Karenina's expression, you instinctively pause the video."}
{3: 'Halfway through the video, Karenina can no longer hold back and press the pause button on the terminal.'}
{2: "What's wrong?", 3: '32'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'I just have one question: is that really me in the video?', 4: '1', 18: '100002124'}
{2: "I can assure you it's definitely you.", 3: '34'}
{3: 'Sitting despondently on the couch, Karenina curls up, her face buried between her knees.'}
{2: 'Are you alright?', 3: '38'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'I wish I were dead.', 4: '1', 18: '100002126'}
{3: 'She does not appear to be alright.'}
{2: "I think you're doing great as a beginner.", 3: '41'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Really? Is that what you think?!', 4: '1', 18: '100002127'}
{3: 'She looks up with a mix of anger and sadness, and she grabs your shoulders, shaking you.'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'I dare you to look me in the eyes and say it again!', 4: '1', 18: '100002128'}
{2: "...Why don't we start by thinking about how we can improve?", 3: '46', 4: 'A better way to put it is the rough edges are more charming.', 5: '48'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Answer my question!', 4: '1', 18: '100002129'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "This isn't time for jokes!", 4: '1', 18: '100002130'}
{2: 'What do you think the problem is?', 3: '51', 4: 'Is it really that bad?', 5: '51'}
{3: 'Constructs can download knowledge data directly through their ports, allowing them to learn rapidly.'}
{3: 'After all, Karenina does not have any prior experience with performing on stage. Learning everything from scratch in such a short time is nearly impossible.'}
{3: 'Therefore, you asked Leonie from WGAA for some data on performances by Golden Age idols.'}
{3: 'Karenina only managed to complete the choreography and music arrangement in such a short time by referencing this data.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: "I didn't sing off-key, and my dance moves couldn't go wrong since they were pre-arranged, but it still feels like something is missing.", 4: '1', 18: '100002132'}
{2: 'Is it because it was just an imitation?', 3: '61', 4: 'Did it feel too routine?', 5: '61'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Yeah. It was like memorizing a formula without understanding its logic. You can't create anything new this way.", 4: '1', 18: '100002133'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "That's why I hate learning things through data transfer. It never feels like mine.", 4: '1', 18: '100002134'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "But what's missing here...? Argh, I don't know.", 4: '1', 18: '100002135'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "I've heard of WGAA artists getting discouraged by creative blocks. Now I understand how they feel.", 4: '1', 18: '100002136'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "We're running out of time. I'm still trying to win first place here.", 4: '1', 18: '100002137'}
{2: "Hold on! You weren't joking before?", 3: '67', 4: 'Time is short indeed.', 5: '70'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Of course! Have I ever not been serious? I said we'd win this, and that's what we're going to do. What will Teddy and the others think otherwise?", 4: '1', 18: '100002138'}
{3: 'You actually found out that the performance is not a competition at all after you looked over the sign-up rules, but you do not want to dampen her spirits when she is so enthusiastic.'}
{3: 'After all, what Karenina really wants is to deliver the best possible performance instead of something perfunctory.'}
{2: 'What if we find someone professional to guide us?', 3: '97'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'I thought about it, but the entire WGAA is busy working on the festival. I doubt anyone has the time to help us.', 4: '1', 18: '100002139'}
{2: 'Perhaps... we could broaden our horizons a bit.', 3: '73'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Horizons? What do you mean? Just spell it out already.', 4: '1', 18: '100002140'}
{3: 'You stand up from your seat and reach out a hand toward Karenina.'}
{2: 'Before that, how about we go out for a walk?', 3: '76'}
{2: "The Paradise Festival starts today, doesn't it?", 3: '98'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Now? Are you serious?', 4: '1', 18: '100002141'}
{3: 'Karenina seems surprised by your sudden suggestion at first, but she quickly catches on to what you mean.'}
{2: "You haven't rested properly for the past few days.", 3: '80', 4: "It's important to have a change of scenery sometimes.", 5: '80'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Even if you say soâ€”', 4: '1', 18: '100002142'}
{3: 'The Engineering Force intended to let Karenina relax during this vacation so she could do what she normally could not.'}
{3: "But Karenina's perfectionist nature has been keeping her on edge."}
{2: "Will you at least keep me company if you're not convinced?", 3: '99'}
{3: 'Karenina smiles wryly before standing up and stretching.'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "I suppose being cooped up here isn't going to help.", 4: '1', 18: '100002144'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "I'll hang out with you for a bit, then. Who knows? I might get inspired somehow.", 4: '1', 18: '100002145'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "But only for an afternoon. In return, you're staying up late tonight to help me work on some new lyrics, okay?", 4: '1', 18: '100002146'}
{2: 'It seems like a bad deal...', 3: '100', 4: 'Okay, then. Do we have a deal?', 5: '92'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "It's too late to regret now. Let's go.", 4: '1', 18: '100002147'}
{3: 'With that, Karenina grabs your wrist and drags you away from her secret base.'}
